item.title: Praxisprojekt SS2015: Treasure Map
item.description: Foto by RachelC Projekt Goal: Develop a Web & Mobile App to plan little explorations either by foot, bike or car including pre-selected locations or locations suggested by peers. Offered as a (Praxisprojekt for IMI Bachelors)[https://imi-bachelor.htw-berlin.de/studium/projekte/projekte-im-sommersemester-2015//]. See the scenarios and user stories below for a rough idea what the apps should support. Scenarios Scenario 1 Deniz rides home on their bike and has an hour of extra time, the sun is shining so they decide to use that hour to visit a place they have wanted to visit (wasn’t there this special bakery somewhere close to the route?
